entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Moncton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:40 a.m. ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Moncton Roméo LeBlanc Int'l Airport 12:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 8.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 54 %
Dewpoint: -0.5°C
Wind: WSW 29 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High 10. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023
